channel.title: Where can I download older Whonix versions?
channel.description: Hello. I recently installed a new os on an old laptop I had. I was using virtualbox with whonix 14 and it ran great. But for some reason after I installed whonix 15, when I try to run the workstation after the initial setup, it crashes my pc. I don't think this is whonix related, I think its a hardware issue since this pc is old and only has 4gb ram. Anyway, is there anywhere I can download the previous version of whonix so I can at least use that?

item.title: Where can I download older Whonix versions?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Not available. Unsupported.

Whonix

Unsupported

What do you mean by unsupported?

Reasons:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Reporting_Bugs#Old_Stable_Support_Policy

Read full topic
item.source: Where can I download older Whonix versions?
